<script>
(function () {
  const MATCH_MODE = "OR"; // OR / AND
  const active = new Set();

  function normalizeTag(t) {
    return (t || "")
      .toLowerCase()
      .trim()
      .replace(/\s+/g, "-"); // "text mining" -> "text-mining"
  }

  function getTokens(cardEl) {
    const tokens = new Set();

    // 1) from data-tags="..."
    const raw = (cardEl.getAttribute("data-tags") || "").toLowerCase().trim();
    raw.split(/\s+/).filter(Boolean).forEach(t => tokens.add(normalizeTag(t)));

    // 2) from tag buttons inside the card (data-filter="...")
    cardEl.querySelectorAll("[data-filter]").forEach(btn => {
      const t = normalizeTag(btn.dataset.filter);
      if (t && t !== "all") tokens.add(t);
    });

    return tokens;
  }

  function applyFilters() {
    const q = (document.getElementById("siteSearch")?.value || "").trim().toLowerCase();

    document.querySelectorAll(".gh-project-card").forEach(el => {
      const tokens = getTokens(el);

      let showByTags = true;
      if (active.size > 0) {
        showByTags = (MATCH_MODE === "AND")
          ? [...active].every(t => tokens.has(t))
          : [...active].some(t => tokens.has(t));
      }

      let showBySearch = true;
      if (q) showBySearch = el.innerText.toLowerCase().includes(q);

      el.style.display = (showByTags && showBySearch) ? "" : "none";
    });

    highlightActive();
  }

  function highlightActive() {
    document.querySelectorAll(".gh-pill[data-filter], .gh-tag[data-filter]").forEach(btn => {
      const tag = normalizeTag(btn.dataset.filter);
      if (tag === "all") btn.classList.toggle("is-active", active.size === 0);
      else btn.classList.toggle("is-active", active.has(tag));
    });
  }

  function toggle(tag) {
    tag = normalizeTag(tag);
    if (tag === "all") active.clear();
    else active.has(tag) ? active.delete(tag) : active.add(tag);
    applyFilters();
  }

  document.addEventListener("click", (e) => {
    const btn = e.target.closest(".gh-pill[data-filter], .gh-tag[data-filter]");
    if (!btn) return;
    toggle(btn.dataset.filter);
  });

  document.getElementById("siteSearch")?.addEventListener("input", applyFilters);

  applyFilters();
})();
</script>
